title.native: すばらしきこのせかい The Animation
title.english: The World Ends with You The Animation

description:
Neku awakens in the middle of Shibuya's bustling Scramble Crossing with no memory of how he got there. Little does he know, he's been transported to an alternate plane of existence known as the Underground (UG). Now an unwilling participant in the mysterious "Reapers' Game," Neku must partner up with a girl named Shiki in order to survive. Together, they complete missions and defeat monsters known as "Noise" as they gradually uncover the true nature of this twisted Game.

"There's only one way to stay alive in Shibuya: trust your partner." Will they survive the Reapers' Game?

(Source: Official Site)

tags.name: Afterlife
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the afterlife.

tags.name: Death Game
tags.description: Features characters participating in a game, where failure results in death.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Survival
tags.description: Centers around the struggle to live in spite of extreme obstacles.

tags.name: Memory Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) who has had their memories altered.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Amnesia
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

tags.name: Rehabilitation
tags.description: Prominently features the recovery of a character who became incapable of social life or work.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Angels
tags.description: Prominently features spiritual beings usually represented with wings and halos and believed to be attendants of God.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Hikikomori
tags.description: Prominently features a character who withdraws from social life, often seeking extreme isolation.

title.native: すばらしきこのせかい

node.description: A Japanese video game music composer and synthesizer programmer currently working at Square Enix. He first worked as a synthesizer programmer before becoming a composer. His first work as a composer is the PlayStation 2 soccer game World Fantasista. More recently, he has been working as one of the composers for the Final Fantasy series.

Tetsuya Nomura is a video game director, character designer, and illustrator currently affiliated with Square Enix (formerly Square) where he belongs to the first development division. He is best known for his work on both the Final Fantasy and Kingdom Hearts series.
Japanese rapper a part of the famous hip-hop unit [Creepy Nuts](https://anilist.co/staff/250935/Creepy-Nuts) and hip-hop group [Umeda Cypher](https://anilist.co/staff/330554)
5th Anisong Grand Prix Finalist with Konomi Suzuki. As Asuka Ookura, she performed Sakurasou no Pet na Kanojo ED2 "Prime Number" on February 2013.

__Residency:__ Tokyo, Japan

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Kuvshinov_Ilya) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=789222) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kuvshinov_ilya) | [ArtStation](https://www.artstation.com/kuvshinov_ilya) | [DeviantArt](https://www.deviantart.com/kuvshinov-ilya) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/KuvshinovIlia) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/Mad1Artist) | [Vimeo](https://vimeo.com/kuvshinovilya) | [Tumblr](http://kuvshinov-ilya.tumblr.com/)

Ilya Kuvshinov is a Russian born animator, illustrator and designer.

__Residency:__ Tokyo, Japan

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Kuvshinov_Ilya) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=789222) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kuvshinov_ilya) | [ArtStation](https://www.artstation.com/kuvshinov_ilya) | [DeviantArt](https://www.deviantart.com/kuvshinov-ilya) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/KuvshinovIlia) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/Mad1Artist) | [Vimeo](https://vimeo.com/kuvshinovilya) | [Tumblr](http://kuvshinov-ilya.tumblr.com/)

Ilya Kuvshinov is a Russian born animator, illustrator and designer.
Producer, representative director of Shin-Ei Animation.
**Hiroyuki Aoi** is a Japanese producer and publicity manager.

Hiroo Maruyama is a producer working for Mainichi Broadcasting System (MBS).

He joined Mainichi Broadcasting in 1999. Was transferred later to the Tokyo office and took over duties relating to the production of animation broadcasts. He was responsible for production on series like Gundam Seed, Gundam Seed Destiny and Full Metal Alchemist, all part of the 6:00pm Saturday timeblock, which gained wide popularity.
